revised_title: Lumped Harmonics of 15th and 30th Order in the Geopotential from Resonant Satellite Orbits
tldr: The author analyzes the orbital data of the satellite 1971-54A to determine lumped harmonic coefficients of order 15 and 30 in the geopotential. The study provides a test for the accuracy of comprehensive models of the Earth's gravity field and contributes to understanding the effects of resonance on satellite orbits.
